title: Requirements Gathering
content: We will analyze web project requirements and instructions given by you.

title: Design / Theme Samples
content: We will send you design draft/themes samples to chose from.

title: Content Creation
content: After design layout is finlized, we will begin content creation and send you drafts.

title: Development and Testing
content: Once content is approved, We will commence web development and testing.

title: Receive a Test URL
content: We will share the test URL with you, as soon as your webiste is ready for review.

title: First Set of Revisions
content: Provide a detailed list of any revisions, changes or updates that need to be made.

title: Second Set of Revisions
content: Provide another set of revisons or update (if any). These will be final revisions.

title: Your Website Goes Live!
content: Congratulations! Your website is live and ready for your target audience!

title: Montize Your Website
content: Now its time to start making money from your website. Get started with SEO or PPC!
